resources.string:
The "Turn-Based RPG Simple Combat Arena" project is authored by Claudiu-È˜tefan Costea, and it is distributed under the terms of the Apache License, Version 2.0 (described at http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0), and without any warranty.

The project includes graphic resources designed by Reiner "Tiles" Prokein, which have been released under the terms described at http://www.reinerstilesets.de/lizenz.

The project also includes the "Rhino" Java library, developed by Mozilla, released under the terms described at https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Mozilla/Projects/Rhino/License. Its source code can be found at https://github.com/mozilla/rhino.

Thank you for trying this application.
